Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Reroute at Northwest Hwy/Overhill
ShortDescription: 68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Canfield and Devon: due to, street blockage near Northwest Hwy/Overhill.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Canfield and Devon: due to, street blockage near Northwest Hwy/Overhill.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/Van Buren
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Harrison, Sacramento and Jackson: due to, street blockage near California/Van Buren.
